title: Market to Businesses: Solving the Recognition Gap
description:
Today we chat about the complexities of marketing a product to businesses, especially when the true beneficiaries are those lower down the employee ladder, those often overlooked by upper management.

Check them out: https://myaicofounder.com/ & https://submind.leoguinan.ai/
